EmailTemplate.name: Escalation Notification-Client Issues
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} has been escalated to our Client Issues Team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
The issue you reported below has been logged as a client issue requiring further review. We will be monitoring this circumstance over the next 7 days. If this circumstance persists, please notify us and reference this ticket number. In the event that this issue is isolated, and the condition does not persist, then this case will be closed in 7 days.
If you have any further questions or need an update on this ticket please call support and reference your case# {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Subject: {!Case.Subject}
VinSolutions Dealer Support
1-800-980-7488 Support@vinsolutions.com
